### Checklist

- [ ] I have read the [contributing guidelines](../CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] The resource is related to React Native
- [ ] The resource is actively maintained (activity within the last 12 months)
- [ ] The resource has meaningful documentation
- [ ] I placed the entry in alphabetical order within its category
- [ ] The description is concise, objective, and ends with a period
- [ ] I searched for duplicates before submitting
- [ ] The link works and points to the correct resource
